item.title: How do i make 99 max stat?
item.dc:creator: @hallowed_soul hallowed soul
item.description:
@hallowed_soul wrote:

Ok, Well If You Needed 100 Magic for Spells Etc, Search The Spells You Needed 100 For, Example, Ice Barrage Search “Ice Barrage” Then Where It Says 100 Change To 99, If You USED To Get Skillcapes When You Got Something At Level 100, Search The Item Id, Until You Find Something Like Them Together, And Change The Needed Level…Its Rather Difficult To Explain,

Read full topic
